name: Gerby1l
messages: Hello there everyone. I love gerbils. Gerbil gerbil gerbil
Did you know that gerbils can survive in space for five hours with no oxygen?
they've been trying to inject gerbil DNA into new astronauts at NASA
appeal_message: Everyone is saying I'm impersonating that one gerbil guy and spamming tomato emojis in my DMs. I didn't realize anybody even gaf about that dweeb and now everyone is saying I'm betraying the sanctity of 'THEMOUSER's gerbil fan'. What is with that. Dude's a nerd
